授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to gain knowledge about key transboundary environmental problems related to global commons, including water, air, and biodiversity.
到達目標:
By the end of semester, students will
-have a firm understanding of key ecological services provided by natural resources;
-gain knowledge and understanding on various transboundary environmental cases;
-identify different types of legal, market and informal policy mechanisms for addressing global environmental issues.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
【合併】Global Environmental Policy（総合政策学部）/地球環境政策（総合政策学部）
